definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: The Committee shall hold closed meetings when examining communications under this article.
sentences.chinese: 委員會應舉行非公開會議時，審查來文根據本條規定。

sentences.english: Acting in accordance with its methods of work, the Working Group forwarded to the Government the above-mentioned communication.
sentences.chinese: 工作組遵循其工作方法，向該國政府轉交了上述來文。

definition: Longxi county in Dingxi 定西[Ding4 xi1], Gansu
Zhang Juzheng (1525-1582), Grand Secretary during the Ming dynasty, credited with bringing the dynasty to its apogee
Xiao He (-193 BC), famous strategist and chancellor, fought on Liu Bang's 劉邦|刘邦[Liu2 Bang1] side during the Chu-Han Contention 楚漢戰爭|楚汉战争[Chu3 Han4 Zhan4 zheng1]

History of the Early Tang Dynasty, sixteenth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Liu Xu 劉昫|刘昫[Liu2 Xu4] in 945 during Later Jin 後晉|后晋[Hou4 Jin4] of the Five Dynasties, 200 scrolls
Sunwu county in Heihe 黑河[Hei1 he2], Heilongjiang
running of armed forces/military management/to govern armed forces/to direct troops

to be in overall charge/to oversee
well versed in letters and military technology (idiom); fine scholar and soldier/master of pen and sword
